title: SAP Enterprise Resource Planning Fundamentals
description:
SAP Enterprise Resource Planning Fundamentals
English | 2015 | mp4 | H264 1280x720 | AAC 2 ch | 6 hrs | 186 MB 
eLearning, Office Productivity, SAP | Skill level: Beginner level


SAP is a multinational software corporation that makes enterprise software to manage business operations. More than 80% of fortune 500 companies have successfully implemented SAP products. SAP was named the most valuable brand in Europe with a value of over 33 billion euros in 2015.

According to pay scale study, an SAP consultant earns an average salary of $120000 per year!

SAP Enterprise Resource Planning Fundamentals is the introduction to SAP for zero-prior-experience audience. 

The topics are covered with a mixture of video lectures and workbooks:

- Intro to SAP
- Navigation
- SAP NetWeaver
- Logistics:
Sales and Distribution
Materials Management
Production and Planning
- Financials
- Human Capital Management
- Business Suite 4 on HANA
- Appendix

You'll stretch your SAP business functional knowledge, SAP technical skills and entrepreneur thinking.

Every minute you delay is actually COSTING you money.

Enroll today, we'll help you succeed and land your dream job.

What are the requirements?

Eager to learn SAP

What am I going to get from this course?

Over 126 lectures and 6.5 hours of content!
Become familiar with the concept of SAP
Explain general business processes in SAP
Prepare you to move on to intermediate level SAP training
Be able to apply your insight to your own SAP project

What is the target audience?

SAP beginner
SAP project manager
SAP potential customer
SAP business functional user
SAP account executive
